thread.title: Reader: Go Ahead and Arrest Kids for Dancing, You Fascist A$$holes!
thread.title_full: Reader: Go Ahead and Arrest Kids for Dancing, You Fascist A$$holes! | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Reader: Go Ahead and Arrest Kids for Dancing, You Fascist A$$holes!
text:
YouTube Our post about a ban against grinding at an Arapahoe High School dance generated some vivid commentary.
Much of the talk centered on the AHS principal's statement in a letter to parents that those who disobeyed this edict might face "possible legal ramifications" â€” a statement backed up by the Arapahoe County Sheriff's Office, which suggests that grinding on someone without permission might qualify as unlawful sexual contact.
Related Stories Letter: Grinding at Arapahoe High Dance Could Have "Legal Ramifications" This reader sparked a lengthy conversation with his reaction to such a prospect.
Here's what he had to say.
Barry Maldonado writes:
Yes! Arrest kids for dancing! Send them to college with arrest records! That's a sure way to ensure our country's success! Same conservative trash that wants less government, as long as everyone is in line and marching to the same beat, fascist a-holes! Just post the armed guards surrounding the dance floor, that will show those darn youngins!
